mapper.select: select id,number,status,cpchannelId from m_simcard where cpid=#{cpId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by cpchannelId
select '1' result from dual where exists (select 1 from m_simcard r where r.packageid=#{packageId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select count(1) simCardCount, sum(case when status=0 then 1 else 0 end) onCardCount, sum(case when status=1 then 1 else 0 end) stopCardCount, sum(case when status=2 then 1 else 0 end) appointCardCount, sum(case when status=3 then 1 else 0 end) readCardCount, sum(case when status=4 then 1 else 0 end) offCardCount from m_simcard r
and r.departmentId=#{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from m_simcard where status=4 and id in(#{item,jdbcType=INTEGER})
